name: Snow
greetingText: I hope this message finds you in good spirits
wishText: May the power of JavaScript always be with you! ;)
text1: It's your special day! I hope you go fuck yourself, but just for today...
textInChatBox: I was thinking of doing something special for a dear friend.
text2: So, here's what I came up with...
text3: With a bit of being lazy and learning,
text4: and lots of gaslighting you, and you being my
text5Content: You are a good friend i dedicate this to you.
